changeSet.author: vpawar
changeSet.sql: insert into os_cpr_cust_fields (cpr_id, form_id, record_id) select cpr.identifier as cpr_id, fc.container_id as form_id, re.record_id from catissue_form_record_entry re inner join catissue_form_context fc on fc.identifier = re.form_ctxt_id inner join catissue_participant p on p.identifier = re.object_id inner join catissue_coll_prot_reg cpr on (cpr.participant_id = p.identifier and (cpr.collection_protocol_id = fc.cp_id or fc.cp_id = -1)) where fc.entity_type = 'ParticipantExtension' and fc.deleted_on is null and re.activity_status = 'ACTIVE'
